bill_title: to revise certain provisions regarding health care professional disciplinary actions.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding health care professional disciplinary actions. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. No member of a professional licensing board regulating health care professionals may be appointed to investigate a health care professional appearing before that professional licensing board on a disciplinary matter or appear as an expert witness before that board. Section 2. Any health care professional required to appear before the professional's licensing board on a disciplinary matter shall receive a copy of the complaint before any required appearance. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
